head.title: Metro Business; Internet Utility Plans Move to Westchester

identified-content.classifier: Top/News/U.S./U.S. States, Territories and Possessions/New York
Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Technology, Telecommunications and Internet

hedline.hl1: Metro Business; Internet Utility Plans Move to Westchester

abstract.p: New Power Company, an Internet utility, is planning to establish its headquarters in Purchase, NY (S)

block.p: The New Power Company, an Internet utility, is planning to establish its headquarters in Purchase, N.Y., state and Westchester County officials said yesterday.

New Power was formed in May by the Houston energy giant Enron to work with America Online and I.B.M. to sell electricity and natural gas to homes and small businesses over the Internet. It has been temporarily located in Greenwich, Conn.
The New Power Company, an Internet utility, is planning to establish its headquarters in Purchase, N.Y., state and Westchester County officials said yesterday.

New Power was formed in May by the Houston energy giant Enron to work with America Online and I.B.M. to sell electricity and natural gas to homes and small businesses over the Internet. It has been temporarily located in Greenwich, Conn.

In return for its commitment to create 400 new jobs at its future headquarters and invest $7 million in renovating and outfitting 80,000 square feet at a Purchase office complex, New Power is eligible to apply for hundreds of thousands of dollars in energy discounts and tax exemptions from state and county agencies.
